original_text: So the man gave them his attention, expecting to get something from them.
korean_text: 그가 그들에게서 무엇을 얻을까 하여 바라보거늘

sentences.original_text: So the man gave them his attention
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 사람은 그들에게 주의를 기울였습니다

sentences.original_text: expecting to get something from them
